item.description:
Les Zygomates, a cool winebar/restaurant in The Leather District near South Station, holds wine tastings every Tuesday. The cost is $30 including food, a great deal. On Tuesday, June 9, Riojas will be sampled. Let's meet up and taste some wonderful Rioja wines.

Wine tastings are Tuesday nights at 7 pm. Four or five wines are offered along with food. The cost is $30 per person, tax & tip included, unless otherwise indicated below. However, this Meet-Up MUST BE PREPAID BY JUNE 5. If you RSVP yes and do not pay by that date, you will be removed from the Meet-Up. I will post the information for payment in a few weeks. The cost will be slightly more ($1-$2) due to the Amazon.com transaction fee.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the wine tasting room

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Rioja Wine Tasting at Les Zygomates
